text: Boil the kale or endives in a large pot of water over medium high heat. Allow the vegetables to boil until softened, but not mushy - about 10 minutes. Make mashed potatoes while your vegetables. If you are making them fresh, you need to, peel, chop, then boil the potatoes. Then mash them, with butter or similar. If you are lazy or prefer artificial food, then you can make instant mashed potatoes with 1 cup of potato flakes and some hot water (follow the box instructions). Add some ranch powder, or salt and pepper, to taste. Turn off the heat on the vegetables and drain. Fry the bacon and crumble into fine pieces. Mix mashed potatoes, veggies, and crumbled bacon in a large bowl. You can add some shredded cheese on top if you like. Pan fry the sausages over medium-high heat until cooked thoroughly. You can also cook this with some truffle oil if you like. If you have rookworst, cook it according to the directions on the package (generally the same way). Serve stamppot on a plate with the sausages on the side. Enjoy!
